text: Fortuna was the goddess of fortune, luck and fate in Roman mythology. Fortuna could bestow good or bad luck onto people. She was sometimes represented veiled and blind. She was a daughter of Jupiter and like him, she could also be bountiful and generous to everybody. ==Related pages== * Tyche - Greek mythology version of Fortuna * The Wheel of Fortune ==Other websites== Category:Roman gods and goddesses
title: Fortuna (mythology)
